body.script:
var siteAlerts = [{"id":3825,"title":"School Closing","body":"
As our calendar indicates, our schools, as well as all charter schools will have their spring recess as scheduled, from April 9-April 17. Teachers will again provide instruction beginning April 20.\n
Como lo indica nuestro calendario, nuestras escuelas, así como todas las escuelas chárter tendrán su receso de primavera según lo programado, del 9 de abril al 17 de abril. Los maestros nuevamente brindarán instrucción a partir del 20 de abril.\n
\n
Governor Cuomo has announced that all schools will be closed until April 15 and he will then decide the date that schools reopen.\n
El Gobernador Cuomo ha anunciado que todas las escuelas estarán cerradas hasta el 15 de abril y luego decidirá la fecha en que las escuelas volverán a abrir.","dateStart":"2020-03-27T16:06:20Z","baseGroupName":"Icahn Charter Schools","hash":"BjrcliYLL6X4JRnYdO4C6cH6Ejkq6m6koYk0XV+GJDY=","updateDate":"2020-04-01T16:55:07Z"},{"id":3819,"title":"School Closing","body":"
Icahn Charter Schools will be closed from Monday, March 16, 2020 through Friday, April 17, 2020. Schools will reopen on Monday, April, 20, 2020. \n
School Closing!","dateStart":"2020-03-13T19:15:17Z","baseGroupName":"Icahn Charter School 6","hash":"9r3qwqLvmk1IG+dQ2dtdWuLjNdwwZnIHoM4SOy1jhg0=","updateDate":"2020-03-16T14:14:56Z"}];

div.p: THE BOARDS OF TRUSTEES OF ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 1, ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 2, ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 3, ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 4, ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 5, ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 6, AND ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL 7 will hold meetings on April 14, 2020 at 3:30p.m. by videoconference. For information, please call (718)-794-2355.

div.p: Guidelines for the Icahn Charter Schools Lottery:
Please click on the links below to access our school's lottery, which will be held on Tuesday, April 21, 2020.
School will be closed from Monday, March 16, 2020 until Friday, April 17, 2020. School will resume on Monday, April 20, 2020.

div.aria-label: Lottery Information for Icahn Charter School 6- 2020-2021 School Year

h2.span: Lottery Information for Icahn Charter School 6- 2020-2021 School Year

div.p: From December 13, 2020 - Monday, April 1, 2020, we will be accepting applications for students entering grades Kindergarten through 8th grade for September 2020.
The direct link to the Online Common Application is:
All applications must be received by 11:59 pm on Tuesday April 1, 2020. The lottery will be held on April 21, 2020.

p.strong: Icahn Charter School 6 Elementary School (Grades K-4) is located at 1701 Fulton Ave. Bronx, NY 10457
Icahn Charter School 6 Middle School (Grades 5-8) is located at 1776 Mansion St. Bronx, NY 10460

div.p: Icahn Charter School 6 Elementary School and Icahn Charter School 6 Middle School will now have two phone numbers for your convenience.
Icahn Charter School 6 Elementary School- 1701 Fulton Ave. (718) 294-1706
Icahn Charter School 6 Middle School 1776 Mansion Street (718) 502- 3301
Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter!

em.strong: The mission of Carl C. Icahn Charter School is to use the Core Knowledge curriculum, developed by E.D. Hirsch, to provide students with a rigorous academic program offered in an extended day/year setting. Students will graduate armed with the skills and knowledge to participate successfully in the most rigorous academic environments, and will have a sense of personal and community responsibility.

a.title: Scanned from a Xerox Multifunction Device-2.pdf

ul.li: Icahn Charter School 6 provides a rigorous Core Knowledge curriculum beginning in Kindergarten.
Our school schedule exceeds that of a conventional public school. The school day will begin at 8:30AM, and ends at 3:45PM.

Icahn Charter School #6 (Grades K-4) is located at:
1701 Fulton Ave. Bronx, NY 10457

Icahn Charter School #6 Middle School (Grades 5-8) is located at:
1776 Mansion Street Bronx, NY 10460

div.p: Get real time school updates on your mobile device with eChalk Notify.
Connect with code Q80QSG to get instant alerts or log in with your eChalk user account for the latest updates from all your classes and groups.
